CustomField.formula: IF(( $Profile.Id = '00eA0000000hNrY' || $Profile.Id ='00eA0000000hNqj'||$Profile.Id ='00e30000000nJ6K') && (ISPICKVAL(Program_Status__c , 'Pending') ) , HYPERLINK('/apex/AutoApproveProgram?id='& Id, IMAGE("resource/1298546011000/AutoApproveMDFPgm", 'Auto Approve'),'_parent'), '[No Action Available]')
CustomField.label: Available Action
